metadata.title: CVE-2022-28733 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Integer underflow in grub_net_recv_ip4_packets; A malicious crafted IPpacket can lead to an integer underflow in grub_net_recv_ip4_packets()function on rsm->total_len value. Under certain circumstances the total_lenvalue may end up wrapping around to a small integer number which will beused in memory allocation. If the attack succeeds in such way, subsequentoperations can write past the end of the buffer.

criterions.comment: grub2 package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
grub2-signed package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
